definition: at or in the very same.../suitable/adequate/fitting/proper/to replace/to regard as/to think/to pawn/(coll.) to fail (a student)
to be/to act as/manage/withstand/when/during/ought/should/match equally/equal/same/obstruct/just at (a time or place)/on the spot/right/just at
to spread/to display/to set up/(old) holder for door-knocker
plank bed/place to sleep/shop/store/(old) relay station

sentences.english: Master Chen was found in a pawn shop them.
sentences.chinese: 后来陈师傅在当铺里发现了它们。

sentences.english: Thomas says many women don't like going to pawn shops.
sentences.chinese: Thomas说很多妇女不喜欢到当铺去。

sentences.english: He was able to redeem his watch from the pawnshop.
sentences.chinese: 他得以从当铺赎回他的表。

sentences.english: The majority of the pawnshop owners were landlords or merchants tied to the landlords.
sentences.chinese: 当铺老板大都是地主或与地主有联系的商人。

sentences.english: He practised at the pawnshop counter for many years.
sentences.chinese: 他当过好多年当铺老板。

sentences.english: There are lots of pawns soul's body in the pawnshop, they do all housework.
sentences.chinese: 当铺中有许多典当了灵魂的躯壳，他们做任何的家务。

sentences.english: Prudence has started up her visits to the pawn-shops again.
sentences.chinese: 普律当丝又开始上当铺了。

sentences.english: I was afraid of that pawnshop's big red door, afraid of its high counter.
sentences.chinese: 我怕当铺的那个大红门，那个大高长柜台。

sentences.english: "are you going to have time to go to that pawnbroker?" she asked.
sentences.chinese: “你会有时间去那个当铺吗？”她问道。

sentences.english: The old pawn shop is located in the FuQiang Street.
sentences.chinese: 清代年间此街有当铺，故富强街旧称典当街。

sentences.english: He redeemed his ring from the pawnbroker.
sentences.chinese: 他从当铺赎回了他的戒指。

sentences.english: A pawnshop museum should be built to reflect the social economy at that time.
sentences.chinese: 宜建一个反映当时社会经济的当铺博物馆。

sentences.english: I'm going to kill that pawnbroker, she told herself.
sentences.chinese: 我要去杀了那个当铺老板，她告诉自己。

sentences.english: Today, in Changchun City, pawnshops have become rich frequently access sites.
sentences.chinese: 可如今在长春市，当铺却成了有钱人频频进出的场所。

sentences.english: His family made their fortune running a pawnshop.
Pawnshops in Wenzhou are very different from those in the West.
sentences.chinese: 温州的当铺与西方的大不相同。

definition: money farm (dealing in illegal foreign currency of money laundering)
an accounts office (in former times)/an accountant/a cashier
